plagiarism.scoreExcellentDesc: Your work shows high originality. Great job!
plagiarism.scoreGoodDesc: Your work is mostly original, but review the flagged sections.
plagiarism.scorePoorDesc: Multiple sections need review. Consider rephrasing or adding citations.

consent.title: Privacy & Data Usage Consent
consent.intro: Welcome to ARSP. Before you begin, please review and accept our data usage policy in compliance with the Digital Personal Data Protection (DPDP) Act.
consent.dataUsage1: To provide AI-powered research assistance and recommendations
consent.dataUsage2: To improve platform performance and user experience
consent.dataUsage3: To ensure security and prevent unauthorized access
consent.yourRights: You have the right to access, modify, or delete your data at any time. Your research content is encrypted and accessible only to you. We do not share your data with third parties without explicit consent.
consent.dpdpCompliance: This platform is fully compliant with India's Digital Personal Data Protection (DPDP) Act, 2023.
